abstract: United States follows European Union in imposing sanctions on Burundians linked to recent violence in country; human rights advocates say both government and rebel groups are responsible for indiscriminate bloodshed in dispute over election of Pres Pierre Nkurunziza to third term.
lead_paragraph: In an apparent effort to achieve some neutrality, the four men identified include two from the government and two from the opposition.

headline.main: U.S. Imposes Sanctions on 4 in Burundi Violence
headline.print_headline: After Violence, U.S. Puts Sanctions on Burundi Officials and Their Rivals

snippet: In an apparent effort to achieve some neutrality, the four men identified include two from the government and two from the opposition.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
